LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalKind.label: Personality (Kind)
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalKind.description: This animal has a kind personality. It will nuzzle colonists more often.
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalIntense.label: Personality (Intense)
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalIntense.description: This animal has an intense personality. It will deal more damage when it attacks.
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalEnergetic.label: Personality (Energetic)
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalEnergetic.description: This animal has an energetic personality. It will move slightly faster.
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalCalm.label: Personality (Calm)
LanguageData.SP_Hediff_AnimalCalm.description: This animal has a calm personality. Its steady movement allows it to haul more items and carry more mass in caravans.
